alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Colquitt; Cook; Lanier; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:21PM EDT until June 13 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR COOK...BERRIEN...LANIER...EASTERN COLQUITT AND SOUTHERN TIFT COUNTIES... At 520 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tifton to 8 miles west of Adel, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. A trained spotter measured a 70 mph wind gust 1 mile north of Fender in Tift county. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Tifton, Nashville, Adel, Lakeland, Moultrie, Sparks, Enigma, Omega, Ray City, Norman Park, Lenox, Alapaha, Phillipsburg, Unionville, Meigs, Berlin, Cecil, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park and Greggs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
